taskwise.title: Task Wise Finances

ml_monitor.title: Mercado Livre Price Monitoring
ml_monitor.description: The project involves a price monitoring system for Mercado Livre. Using the Scrapy library in Python, it collects data daily from a specific selection of products on Mercado Livre. This data is stored in a MongoDB database and exposed through an API built with FastAPI.

rag_chatbot.title: IA Assistant – RAG Chatbot
rag_chatbot.description: Developed a chatbot system using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture. Leveraged a vectorized database containing personal information, integrated via LangChain and embeddings, to retrieve relevant data and generate natural language responses using a large language model (LLM).
